title: (x) Infomag logo very bold sans - Fedra Headline 2 {Ulli Neutzling}
content:
fellow typophiles,

I need to know what is this font... It looks like bureau grotesque but im not sure.

anyone?

dr

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907054411im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo_6609.gif)

 [‹ ID: yacht sail numbers font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907054411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45531 "Go to previous forum topic") [Scottish Government Typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907054411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45524 "Go to next forum topic")
author: David R

comments.content:
looks like an edited [fedra sans display 2 heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907054411/http:/www.typotheque.com/fedra_sans_display2).  
- the f-stroke is cut on the left side.
